TILE(6D)                                               TILE(6D)





NAME
       tile - repeats an image in two dimensions

SYNOPSIS
       tile inimage outimage xsize ysize

DESCRIPTION
       tile repeats an image in two dimensions. An output image
       that is xsize by ysize pixels is  created  by  repeating
       the input image.

SEE ALSO
       assemble(6D)



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004                  TILE(6D)
